definition: Soros (name)/George Soros or György Schwartz (1930-), Hungarian American financial speculator and millionaire philanthropist
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
George Soros or György Schwartz (1930-), Hungarian American financial speculator and millionaire philanthropist

sentences.english: So when George Soros talks currencies, people listen.
sentences.chinese: 因此，當喬治索羅斯會談貨幣時，人們奉若神牌。

sentences.english: Addario is also a recipient of the Soros Foundation Grant.
sentences.chinese: 阿黛瑞爾目前還是索羅斯基金的贊助對象。

sentences.english: You write as if you and Soros have been playing roulette.
sentences.chinese: 你寫得就好像你和索羅斯是在玩兒輪盤賭一樣。

sentences.english: Soros credits the anti-globalisation movement for having made companies more sensitive to their wider responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 索羅斯讚揚反全球化運動使各公司認識到更的責任。

definition: to invest in stock/to buy shares
subprime mortgage crisis/abbr. for 次級房屋信貸危機|次级房屋信贷危机[ci4 ji2 fang2 wu1 xin4 dai4 wei1 ji1]
lit. big crocodile/fig. major figure/big shot/top boss (esp. criminal)
Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
